mdRecord.dcterms:title: Lady Nancy Astor at UVa football game

mdRecord.dcterms:description: Lady Nancy Astor, guest of honor at University of Virginia vs. South Carolina football game in Lambeth Field, poses with rival captains, Bill Luke (left), UVA, and Eddie Cooper (right), SC. Athletics - Sports - Football. 1 b&w photograph.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Visual History Collection
